verses.roman:
mukunda-datta lañā āilā sārvabhauma sthāne
sārvabhauma kichu tāṅre balilā vacane

synonyms: mukunda-datta—of the name Mukunda Datta; lañā—taking; āilā—went; sārvabhauma—of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; sthāne—to the place; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kichu—something; tāṅre—to Mukunda Datta; balilā—said; vacane—in words.
translation: Gopīnātha Ācārya then took Mukunda Datta with him and went to Sārvabhauma's house. When they arrived, Sārvabhauma addressed Mukunda Datta as follows.
